title: Cody Simpson says Miley Cyrus was his childhood celebrity crush in resurfaced video
text:
His steamy make-out session with Miley Cyrus may have taken fans by surprise, but Cody Simpson's affection for the pop-star is nothing new.

In a resurfaced video from 2012, a 15-year-old Cody gushed to Fuse about the Hannah Montana actress, admitting: 'Miley Cyrus has always been my childhood celebrity crush.'

'I knew all the words to her songs, I'm not going to lie,' the fresh-faced crooner confessed.

It was meant to be! In a resurfaced video from 2012, a 15-year-old Cody Simpson gushed to Fuse about Miley Cyrus, admitting she 'has always been my childhood celebrity crush'

'I'm not ashamed about it, at all. I was a big Miley Cyrus fan. I think she will be forever the most dateable Disney star,' he added.

Meanwhile, things appear to be going well for Cody and his new squeeze Miley, with the Australian hunk calling her his 'baby' on Saturday morning.

The 22-year-old shared a photo kissing his new love on the head while thanking her for the breakfast she had made him.

'Baby': Cody professed his love for Miley on Saturday morning when he shared she had made him a healthy breakfast to start the day

'Pre swim breakfast courtesy of baby,' he captioned.

The monochrome shot saw Miley wearing a thin white T-shirt for the morning photo.

Her eyes were closed while the ex-boyfriend of Kylie Jenner and Gigi Hadid gave her a kiss on her head.

Delicious! 'Pre swim breakfast courtesy of baby,' he captioned

Musician turned athlete: Cody's breakfast comes ahead of his swimming race at USC later in the day

Miley's skills in the kitchen saw her make Cody two slices of peanut butter toast topped with banana as well as a berry smoothie that had goji berries sprinkled over the top.

Cody's breakfast comes ahead of his swimming race at USC later in the day.

The long-time friend's social media post comes after the Mother's Daughter singer shared a long post on Friday about how hard it was to date in the public eye while slamming 'slut-shamers' for calling her a 'whore.'

Speaking her truth: On Friday, Miley Cyrus took to social media to express herself about how she's portrayed in the media, and her new relationship with Cody Simpson; the pair seen here in Miley's Instagram post from 2015

For one of the topless shots of Cody, Miley captioned in the form of a checklist, listing out the hunk's credentials: his age, Australian nationality (which she mentioned is 'my type' surely as a nod to her ex love Liam), and his 'abs'.

'I know the public feels invested in my past relationship [with ex Liam Hemsworth] because they felt like they saw it thru from the beginning,' the star began her longer confessional.

'I think that's why people have always felt so entitled over my life and how I live it because they've watched me grow up.'

'But I am grown now,' Cyrus continued, 'and make choices as an adult knowing the truth/details/reality.' People only 'know' what they see on the internet.'

Miley also addressed the inequity of how famous women are portrayed in their pursuit of love and intimacy, as compared to famous men.

'Men (especially successful ones) are RARELY slut shamed. They move on from one beautiful woman to the next MOST times without consequence. They are referred to as 'legends', 'heart throbs',' she continued, 'where women are called sluts/whores! I am trying to just THRIVE/survive in a 'mans' world.'

'If we can't beat em, join em!' Miley concluded the section. 'If our president can 'grab em by the p***y...' can't I just have a kiss and acai bowl?!?!'

After specifically responding to being recently spotted kissing Cody, she addressed the budding relationship on the next screen of her Instagram story.

She's into him: For one of the topless shots she posted of Cody, Miley captioned in the form of a checklist, listing out the hunk's credentials

'I refuse to recluse and 'date' from home cause A. That's not fun B. Extremely uncomfortable/puts me in a vulnerable position,' the Slide Away performer expressed.

'I would like to share an activity with someone I am dating and not be stuck at home with pretty much nothing to do but 'Netflix and chill'.

'This 'dating' thing is new to me too. I've never been an 'adult'/grown a** woman experiencing this... I was in a committed relationship for almost All my teens and early 20s; with the exception of a few breaks, which usually in those times I was working my a** off with not much R&R... and 'meeting/trusting' people in my position is really tuff.'

'Don't f***ing pity me, not what I'm asking for,' Miley concluded. 'I have a great life I wouldn't trade for 'privacy' but PLEASE don't make this awkward for me! I am trying to make light and like always MAKE FUN of myself/and the public's perception of me! Get used to me dating – this is where I am at!'

Claiming what's hers: Another of Miley's adoring snaps of Cody on her Instagram story on Friday

This isn't the first time the singer has used social media to vent.

Shortly after her split from Liam Hemsworth was made public late this summer, Cyrus made a public statement on Twitter an Instagram that revealed some of her feelings about the split, and how it was important for her to set the record straight.

'At this point I had to make a healthy decision for myself to leave a previous life behind,' she tweeted on August 22.

'I am the healthiest and happiest I have been in a long time. You can say I am a twerking, pot smoking , foul mouthed hillbilly but I am not a liar.'

Setting it straight: This isn't the first time the singer has used social media to vent
description: His steamy make-out session with Miley Cyrus may have taken fans by surprise, but Cody Simpson's affection for the pop-star is nothing new.
